column5: Beautiful rustic getaway from the hustle and bustle of life, settled on 40acres. Located only 15 miles from Canton First Monday's flea market and 74 miles from Dallas/Ft Worth metroplex, just off Interstate 20 on the service road.  We have a beautiful pond with a paddle boat and a small boat for fishing. Our pond is stocked with catfish, big mouth bass, crappie and perch!
column8: Tammy's Home at Circle F Ranch
